text: The Scorpion King is a 2002 American fantasy adventure movie. It is a spin- off/prequel to 1999's The Mummy. It has Dwayne Johnson's first lead role in a movie. == Cast == * Dwayne Johnson as Mathayus / The Scorpion King * Steven Brand as Memnon * Kelly Hu as Cassandra * Michael Clarke Duncan as Balthazar * Bernard Hill == Reboot == Dwayne Johnson is producing a reboot movie set in the 21st century. == Other websites == * Official site * Category:2002 adventure movies Category:2002 fantasy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Chuck Russell Category:Movie spin-offs Category:Prequel movies Category:The Mummy Category:The Scorpion King (movie series) Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Screenplays by Stephen Sommers Category:Period action movies
title: The Scorpion King
